steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_test_project --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 5: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_agent --> navigate to Page_agent
step 6: At Page_agent click on hyperlink_agent_test_cloud --> navigate to Page_agent_test-cloud
step 7: At Page_agent_test-cloud click on button_select_organization
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page_agent_test-cloud
